item.title: HAEMONETICS CORP 10-K
item.description: HAEMONETICS CORP, which is in the Surgical & Medical Instruments & Apparatus [3841] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 26, 2021 had 42197 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 474 instances 2021 - 334 instances million - 325 instances fiscal - 308 instances financial - 293 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
